text:
HeadSpin | Multiple Positions | Palo Alto, CA | Full-Time | ONSITE | www.headspin.io

HeadSpin helps developers test their mobile apps globally.

We focus on collecting data from real cell networks and user scenarios to identify and fix performance problems in mobile applications and endpoints.

Mainly the team uses Python, Go, MySQL, Docker, Angular, Appium, native Android, and native iOS.

Come join 'one of the fastest-scaling companies' in the bay area! https://techcrunch.com/2018/10/30/gv-backed-mobile-app-perfo...

Find all of our jobs here: https://jobs.lever.co/headspin
